They explain what recruiters check in a profile.
level_2: Guests explain how to write a LinkedIn summary.
They share how to link GitHub repos in LinkedIn.
Podcasts teach posting updates about projects.

level_3: Podcasts teach how to write useful posts and blogs.

Guests share how to comment nicely and build connections.
They discuss open source work for personal branding.

level_4: Podcasts talk about guiding juniors on branding.
They explain speaking at events for brand growth.
Episodes cover writing newsletters and blogs.
They share tips to keep your brand honest.
Guests explain long-term trust building online.
